title: A Bioelectromagnetic Proposal Approaching the Complex Challenges of COVID-19
author: Andras Szasz; Scientific Research Publishing
description: Discover the complexity of COVID-19 research and the potential of bioelectromagnetic processes in finding a pharmaceutical solution. Explore the dynamic interactions and pathways for overcoming the disease.
